<!--*Please add a concise summary of your suggestion here.*-->

Someone needs to add spack external find support to lustre

### Rationale

Lustre is a dependency for some packages, but it /cannot/ be installed.  The current help text says that you need to modify your .yaml files manually.

With `spack external find` we don't need to do this anymore.

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack: 0.15.4-1006-e5cc37b71
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: lustre: Needs `spack external find` support
